scripts.dev: for d in windows/projects windows/settings windows/dashboard; do if [ -e "$d/.nuxt" ] && [ ! -d "$d/.nuxt" ]; then rm -rf "$d/.nuxt"; fi; mkdir -p "$d/.nuxt/dev"; done && turbo run dev
scripts.icon:generate: cd src-tauri && cargo tauri icon ../KhaosIcon/KhaosIcon-iOS-Default-1024x1024@1x.png -o icons
scripts.build:tauri-assets: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/settings dist/dashboard && cp -R windows/projects/.output/public/. dist/ && cp -R windows/settings/.output/public/. dist/settings/ && cp -R windows/dashboard/.output/public/. dist/dashboard/
scripts.build:tauri: pnpm --filter @khaos/projects-window run generate && pnpm --filter @khaos/settings-window run generate && pnpm --filter @khaos/dashboard-window run generate && pnpm run build:tauri-assets
scripts.build:prod: cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --bundles app
